subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Nate Robinson, the Chicago Bulls’ sprightly 5-foot 9-inch guard, exploded for 35 points, including 8 in overtime, sending the Knicks to their first loss since March 17.
snippet: Nate Robinson, the Chicago Bulls’ sprightly 5-foot 9-inch guard, exploded for 35 points, including 8 in overtime, sending the Knicks to their first loss since March 17.
